description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Shades:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Shade}s, they gain {CONDNAME_BUFF_INVISIBLE} at the end of their turns and have an independent 100% chance to dodge while they have this buff.
name: Sigil of the Shade
